description: Windows Sandbox configuration for Tencent applications (QQ, WeChat, WeMeet, etc.)
post_install: Write-Host '1. Use the Start Menu shortcut "Tencent Sandbox"' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host '2. Or navigate to: $dir and double-click Tencent.wsb' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host '3. Install Tencent applications inside the sandbox' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host 'Directory structure has been automatically created.' -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host '- Windows Sandbox feature enabled' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host 'To enable Windows Sandbox, run as Administrator:' -ForegroundColor Yellow
notes: This package requires Windows Sandbox to be enabled
Windows Sandbox is only available on Windows 10 Pro/Enterprise/Education and Windows 11 Pro/Enterprise/Education
After installation, navigate to the installation directory and run Tencent.wsb
All Tencent application data will persist after closing the sandbox
